issue.title: [CF 1530] Guradians
issue.body:
Any chance we could get a guardian consolidation feature? Demonology summons a lot of guardians, and it's very difficult to process 20 icons at once compared to for instance one icon per summon spell with a stack number indicating number of demons associated with it.

 

Obviously this is a very specific request, no rush to get to it.

 

Also related, the addon currently doesn't recognise the Vilefiend guardian.


> Posted by CurseForge user AwkwardSquirtle | Imported from CurseForge issue #1530 | Raw

comments.body:
It already does that. Just don't use it as a group controller.

 

I'll add Vilefiend. Looks like there are a few other issues with it as well that I didn't notice.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
